title: Smart Security
shortDescription: Advanced surveillance and access control for peace of mind.
subtitle: Peace of Mind, redefined
introTitle: Advanced protection for your family and property.
introText: Our integrated security solutions go beyond simple alarms. We combine high-definition surveillance, smart access control, and automated deterrents to create a robust safety shield around your home.

featureSections.title: Intelligent Surveillance
featureSections.description: AI-powered cameras distinguish between people, pets, and vehicles, sending you only the alerts that matter.

featureSections.title: Smart Locks & Access
featureSections.description: Manage entry for family, guests, and service providers remotely. Receive notifications whenever a door is unlocked.

featureSections.title: Perimeter Defense
featureSections.description: Automated lighting and motion sensors create a deterrent barrier before an intruder even reaches your home.
